Advisory.Description:
## Impact:
A security issue has been found in `terraform-provider-windns` before version `1.0.5`. The `windns_record` resource did not santize the input variables. This can lead to authenticated command injection in the underlyding powershell command prompt.

## Patches:

[`83ef736 (fix: better input validation)`](https://github.com/nrkno/terraform-provider-windns/commit/c76f69610c1b502f90aaed8c4f102194530b5bce)
  
## Fixed versions:

- `v1.0.5`
Advisory.Summary: Terraform WinDNS Provider improperly sanitizes input variables in `windns_record`
